reviews.review: Demaaaais!!!
Some good old fashioned zombie killing fun
Évaluer Killing Floor
Lots of action and lots of killing, the clots will come for you. verry fun, quite a bit of replay value.

Not only is this a zombie game. Its a zombie game with challenge. A lot of zombie games are run'n'gun (CoD), but Killing Floor takes some teamwork. In killing floor, you must work as a team to defeat the Boss at Wave 11. Working as a team with different classes can provide bonuses, Marksman can headshot higher tier zombies, while Flamethrowers burn down the Clots. Assaults can kill Stealthy mofos with ease, and Demolitions can get high damage across multiple targets. If you're looking for an out of the norm Zombie game, this one is great. Not to mention is fairly old and gets plenty of updates.
This game is good coop shooter, but it is a bit scary. My nerves are bad.((( 8.9/10

This game is amazing! I hope killing floor 2 is just as great as this one because it is a must buy if you love games where you blast enemies with cool weapons and a ton of gore.

I've put a lot of time into games like the left 4 dead series and then i saw this game when roosterteeth did a LP on it and at first i was a bit sceptical about it, but then when i saw it on sale this week i decided if i was going to get it, i had better get it now. Best $4.99 i've ever spent on a game to be honest. In fact, i bought 3 copies for friends as well so that alone should show how much i like it.


Maps - Killing Floor has some great maps that give the players a lot of room for movement or kiting which is essential when facing the bigger bosses plus you get the ability to close doors and then weld them shut in order to provide a obstacle for the zeds (zombies).

Trading - You get cash (euros) for each kill and then at the end of each wave you can go to a trader to get more weapons or armor. If you or a friend is low on cash, you can press B to throw some on the floor for someone to pickup. It drops in increments of 50.

Community - So far every match i have been in, the players are very helpful and as a result i've actually made quite a few friends within a few hours of playing. The servers are very populated and there are plenty of them to choose from.

Gun Recoil - Gun recoil in this game is manageable but those who are used to fps games won't have much of a problem with this. However, those who are new to fps games in general are going to have a bit of trouble at the start due to the amount of recoil that some guns have. As you level your perks up the recoil will get better over time. 


All in all i love the game and it was well worth the price tag, so stop reading these reviews and get it. NAO!

Playing this game is quite literally a "Bloody good time". If you are a fan of any of the popular zombie games using Valve's Source engines (No More Room in Hell, Left 4 Dead 1/2, Zombie Panic! Source, for example) and need a little more gruesomeness with a bunch of quirky british mercs (who all suprisingly sound a lot like Harold Lott), I wouldn't even hesitate to recommend this game to you. As I said before, you'll have a "Bloody good time" playing this game. I guarantee it.

[b] 8/10 [/b]

I have to award Killing Floor 8/10 because it has nearly infinite replayabilty, something rare and yet cherished. Best played with a team of freinds on voice chat the co-op it provides is interesting and yet still challenging. 

There is little to killing floor, no real "story mode" or any versus multiplayer. The sole objective is to survive against multiple waves of "zeds". It is however still incredible fun and I have put a great many hours into it. It possibly requires a lower score out of 10 considering the company it keeps (with particular mention of Mass Effect), but purley for the amount of fun I've had playing it and the hours spent I have to award it 8/10.

Do you like grinding endlessly to rank up and increase your odds of survival while having fun blasting waves and more waves of mutants and dealing with a short break to shop for weapons so you can kill MORE mutants easily? After roughly 540h of gameplay, i still find it to be fun to play. Oh, SLOWMOTION HEADSHOTS AND GORY SCENES, aka zedtime is plain awesome!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS, and it will bring you the best experience available.

8/10.

Отличная игра. Можно зависнуть в ней на ВЕЧНОСТЬ.
+Куча различного вооружения, от С4 до ПИЛЫ, заканчивая дедушкиным Тозом.
-Есть раки.
+В команде очень интересно играть, не смотря на то, кто с тобой играет.
+Очень часто выходят моды, карты.
-Для новичков в играх про зомби будет тяжко даже на нормальном.
-Не самая передовая графика, игра вообще может идти на 16 битках. (см. настройки игры)
+Так как самим критикам игра на 6.4, часто проходят СКИДКИ по ней. Игра стоит очень дешево, даже без скидок.
=Всем советую купить, игра конечно ХАРДКОРНАЯ, Новичкам рекомендуется играть на высоких сложностях. (Вам же хуже)
